review: Works good.. once I got it set up.... suggest not using TV usb as power source.. will cause setup/connection problems.... had no luck completing the install/set up with usb cable connected to the TV ....  after changing power source from TV to AC adapter.. zipped right thru the install with no problems...

review: The negative reviews about the Roku streaming stick were very true, I should have listened after reading them. This device was very disappointing. Extreme freeze ups and over heating. I will be returning the stick back and would never recommend  this item to anyone. The Roku 3 worked flawlessly and is the way to go. I will purchase another Roku 3 in the near future. Roku, 'Please' send the stick back too the Lab for further development.
